ayah: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ

ayah: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ أَوۡ مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ غَيۡرُ مَلُومِينَ
ayah_translit: illa ala azwajihim aw ma malakat aymanuhum fa-innahum ghayru malumina

ayah_translit: thumma ja'alnahu nut'fatan fi qararin makinin
ayah_english: Then We placed him (as) a semen-drop in a resting place firm

ayah: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ نُطۡفَةٗ فِي قَرَارٖ مَّكِينٖ
ayah_translit: thumma ja'alnahu nut'fatan fi qararin makinin
ayah_english: Then We placed him (as) a semen-drop in a resting place firm

ayah: ثُمَّ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلنُّطۡفَةَ عَلَقَةٗ فَخَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡعَلَقَةَ مُضۡغَةٗ فَخَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡمُضۡغَةَ عِظَٰمٗا فَكَسَوۡنَا ٱلۡعِظَٰمَ لَحۡمٗا ثُمَّ أَنشَأۡنَٰهُ خَلۡقًا ءَاخَرَۚ فَتَبَارَكَ ٱللَّهُ أَحۡسَنُ ٱلۡخَٰلِقِينَ
ayah_translit: thumma khalaqna al-nut'fata alaqatan fakhalaqna al-'alaqata mud'ghatan fakhalaqna al-mud'ghata izaman fakasawna al-'izama lahman thumma anshanahu khalqan akhara fatabaraka al-lahu ahsanu al-khaliqina
ayah_english: Then We created the semen-drop (into) a clinging substance then We created the clinging substance (into) an embryonic lump then We created the embryonic lump (into) bones then We clothed the bones (with) flesh then We produce it (as) a creation another So blessed is Allah (the) Best (of) the Creators

ayah_english: Then We created the semen-drop (into) a clinging substance then We created the clinging substance (into) an embryonic lump then We created the embryonic lump (into) bones then We clothed the bones (with) flesh then We produce it (as) a creation another So blessed is Allah (the) Best (of) the Creators

ayah: ثُمَّ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلنُّطۡفَةَ عَلَقَةٗ فَخَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡعَلَقَةَ مُضۡغَةٗ فَخَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡمُضۡغَةَ عِظَٰمٗا فَكَسَوۡنَا ٱلۡعِظَٰمَ لَحۡمٗا ثُمَّ أَنشَأۡنَٰهُ خَلۡقًا ءَاخَرَۚ فَتَبَارَكَ ٱللَّهُ أَحۡسَنُ ٱلۡخَٰلِقِينَ

ayah: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُم بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ لَمَيِّتُونَ
ayah_translit: thumma innakum ba'da dhalika lamayyituna
ayah_english: Then indeed you after that surely (will) die

ayah: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ تُبۡعَثُونَ
ayah_translit: thumma innakum yawma al-qiyamati tub'athuna
ayah_english: Then indeed you (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection will be resurrected

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا فَوۡقَكُمۡ سَبۡعَ طَرَآئِقَ وَمَا كُنَّا عَنِ ٱلۡخَلۡقِ غَٰفِلِينَ
ayah_translit: walaqad khalaqna fawqakum sab'a taraiqa wama kunna ani al-khalqi ghafilina
ayah_english: And indeed We (have) created above you seven paths and not We are of the creation unaware

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا فَوۡقَكُمۡ سَبۡعَ طَرَآئِقَ وَمَا كُنَّا عَنِ ٱلۡخَلۡقِ غَٰفِلِينَ

ayah: وَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءَۢ بِقَدَرٖ فَأَسۡكَنَّـٰهُ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰ ذَهَابِۭ بِهِۦ لَقَٰدِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-anzalna mina al-samai maan biqadarin fa-askannahu fi al-ardi wa-inna ala dhahabin bihi laqadiruna
ayah_english: And We send down from the sky water in (due) measure then We cause it to settle in the earth And indeed, We on taking it away taking it away surely (are) Able

ayah: فَأَنشَأۡنَا لَكُم بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٖ مِّن نَّخِيلٖ وَأَعۡنَٰبٖ لَّكُمۡ فِيهَا فَوَٰكِهُ كَثِيرَةٞ وَمِنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-anshana lakum bihi jannatin min nakhilin wa-a'nabin lakum fiha fawakihu kathiratun wamin'ha takuluna
ayah_english: Then We produced for you by it gardens of date-palms of date-palms and grapevines for you in it (are) fruits abundant and from them you eat

ayah: وَشَجَرَةٗ تَخۡرُجُ مِن طُورِ سَيۡنَآءَ تَنۢبُتُ بِٱلدُّهۡنِ وَصِبۡغٖ لِّلۡأٓكِلِينَ
ayah_translit: washajaratan takhruju min turi saynaa tanbutu bil-duh'ni wasib'ghin lil'akilina
ayah_english: And a tree (that) springs forth from Mount Sinai Mount Sinai (which) produces oil and a relish for those who eat

ayah: وَإِنَّ لَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ لَعِبۡرَةٗۖ نُّسۡقِيكُم مِّمَّا فِي بُطُونِهَا وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ كَثِيرَةٞ وَمِنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-inna lakum fi al-an'ami la'ib'ratan nus'qikum mimma fi butuniha walakum fiha manafi'u kathiratun wamin'ha takuluna
ayah_english: And indeed for you in the cattle surely (is) a lesson We give you drink from what (is) in their bellies and for you in them (are) benefits many and of them you eat

ayah_english: And on them and on [the] ships you are carried

ayah: وَعَلَيۡهَا وَعَلَى ٱلۡفُلۡكِ تُحۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wa'alayha wa'ala al-ful'ki tuh'maluna
ayah_english: And on them and on [the] ships you are carried

ayah: وَعَلَيۡهَا وَعَلَى ٱلۡفُلۡكِ تُحۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wa'alayha wa'ala al-ful'ki tuh'maluna
ayah_english: And on them and on [the] ships you are carried

ayah: وَعَلَيۡهَا وَعَلَى ٱلۡفُلۡكِ تُحۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wa'alayha wa'ala al-ful'ki tuh'maluna
ayah_english: And on them and on [the] ships you are carried

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ فَقَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥٓۚ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
ayah_translit: walaqad arsalna nuhan ila qawmihi faqala yaqawmi u'budu al-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu afala tattaquna
ayah_english: And verily We sent Nuh to his people and he said O my people! Worship Allah not for you (is) any god other than Him Then will not you fear

ayah_english: And verily We sent Nuh to his people and he said O my people! Worship Allah not for you (is) any god other than Him Then will not you fear

ayah: فَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦ مَا هَٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُكُمۡ يُرِيدُ أَن يَتَفَضَّلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَلَوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَنزَلَ مَلَـٰٓئِكَةٗ مَّا سَمِعۡنَا بِهَٰذَا فِيٓ ءَابَآئِنَا ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_translit: faqala al-mala-u alladhina kafaru min qawmihi ma hadha illa basharun mith'lukum yuridu an yatafaddala alaykum walaw shaa al-lahu la-anzala malaikatan ma sami'na bihadha fi abaina al-awalina
ayah_english: But said the chiefs (of) those who disbelieved among his people This is not This is not but a man like you he wishes to assert (his) superiority over you and if Allah had willed Allah had willed surely He (would have) sent down Angels Not we heard of this from our forefathers our forefathers

ayah: فَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦ مَا هَٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُكُمۡ يُرِيدُ أَن يَتَفَضَّلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَلَوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَنزَلَ مَلَـٰٓئِكَةٗ مَّا سَمِعۡنَا بِهَٰذَا فِيٓ ءَابَآئِنَا ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

ayah: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلُۢ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٞ فَتَرَبَّصُواْ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ
ayah_translit: in huwa illa rajulun bihi jinnatun fatarabbasu bihi hatta hinin
ayah_english: Not he (is) but a man in him (is) madness so wait concerning him until a time

ayah: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلُۢ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٞ فَتَرَبَّصُواْ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ
ayah_translit: in huwa illa rajulun bihi jinnatun fatarabbasu bihi hatta hinin
ayah_english: Not he (is) but a man in him (is) madness so wait concerning him until a time

ayah: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرۡنِي بِمَا كَذَّبُونِ
ayah_translit: qala rabbi unsur'ni bima kadhabuni
ayah_english: He said My Lord! Help me because they deny me

ayah_translit: qala rabbi unsur'ni bima kadhabuni

ayah: فَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِ أَنِ ٱصۡنَعِ ٱلۡفُلۡكَ بِأَعۡيُنِنَا وَوَحۡيِنَا فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَمۡرُنَا وَفَارَ ٱلتَّنُّورُ فَٱسۡلُكۡ فِيهَا مِن كُلّٖ زَوۡجَيۡنِ ٱثۡنَيۡنِ وَأَهۡلَكَ إِلَّا مَن سَبَقَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ مِنۡهُمۡۖ وَلَا تُخَٰطِبۡنِي فِي ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓاْ إِنَّهُم مُّغۡرَقُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-awhayna ilayhi ani is'na'i al-ful'ka bi-a'yunina wawahyina fa-idha jaa amruna wafara al-tanuru fa-us'luk fiha min kullin zawjayni ith'nayni wa-ahlaka illa man sabaqa alayhi al-qawlu min'hum wala tukhatib'ni fi alladhina zalamu innahum mugh'raquna
ayah_english: So We inspired to him That construct the ship under Our eyes and Our inspiration then when comes Our Command and gushes forth the oven then put into it of every (kind) (of) mates two and your family except those (has) preceded against whom the Word thereof And (do) not address Me concerning those who wronged indeed they (are) the ones to be drowned

ayah: فَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِ أَنِ ٱصۡنَعِ ٱلۡفُلۡكَ بِأَعۡيُنِنَا وَوَحۡيِنَا فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَمۡرُنَا وَفَارَ ٱلتَّنُّورُ فَٱسۡلُكۡ فِيهَا مِن كُلّٖ زَوۡجَيۡنِ ٱثۡنَيۡنِ وَأَهۡلَكَ إِلَّا مَن سَبَقَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ مِنۡهُمۡۖ وَلَا تُخَٰطِبۡنِي فِي ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓاْ إِنَّهُم مُّغۡرَقُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-awhayna ilayhi ani is'na'i al-ful'ka bi-a'yunina wawahyina fa-idha jaa amruna wafara al-tanuru fa-us'luk fiha min kullin zawjayni ith'nayni wa-ahlaka illa man sabaqa alayhi al-qawlu min'hum wala tukhatib'ni fi alladhina zalamu innahum mugh'raquna

ayah: فَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِ أَنِ ٱصۡنَعِ ٱلۡفُلۡكَ بِأَعۡيُنِنَا وَوَحۡيِنَا فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَمۡرُنَا وَفَارَ ٱلتَّنُّورُ فَٱسۡلُكۡ فِيهَا مِن كُلّٖ زَوۡجَيۡنِ ٱثۡنَيۡنِ وَأَهۡلَكَ إِلَّا مَن سَبَقَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ مِنۡهُمۡۖ وَلَا تُخَٰطِبۡنِي فِي ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓاْ إِنَّهُم مُّغۡرَقُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-awhayna ilayhi ani is'na'i al-ful'ka bi-a'yunina wawahyina fa-idha jaa amruna wafara al-tanuru fa-us'luk fiha min kullin zawjayni ith'nayni wa-ahlaka illa man sabaqa alayhi al-qawlu min'hum wala tukhatib'ni fi alladhina zalamu innahum mugh'raquna

ayah: فَإِذَا ٱسۡتَوَيۡتَ أَنتَ وَمَن مَّعَكَ عَلَى ٱلۡفُلۡكِ فَقُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي نَجَّىٰنَا مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-idha is'tawayta anta waman ma'aka ala al-ful'ki faquli al-hamdu lillahi alladhi najjana mina al-qawmi al-zalimina
ayah_english: And when you (have) boarded you and whoever (is) with you [on] the ship then say Praise (be) to Allah Who (has) saved us from the people the wrongdoers."

ayah: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَنزِلۡنِي مُنزَلٗا مُّبَارَكٗا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمُنزِلِينَ
ayah_translit: waqul rabbi anzil'ni munzalan mubarakan wa-anta khayru al-munzilina
ayah_english: And say My Lord cause me to land (at) a landing place blessed and You (are) the Best (of) those who cause to"

ayah: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبۡتَلِينَ
ayah_translit: inna fi dhalika laayatin wa-in kunna lamub'talina
ayah_english: Indeed in that surely (are) Signs and indeed We are surely testing

ayah: ثُمَّ أَنشَأۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ قَرۡنًا ءَاخَرِينَ
ayah_translit: thumma anshana min ba'dihim qarnan akharina
ayah_english: Then We produced after them after them a generation another

ayah: فَأَرۡسَلۡنَا فِيهِمۡ رَسُولٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ أَنِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥٓۚ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-arsalna fihim rasulan min'hum ani u'budu al-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu afala tattaquna
ayah_english: And We sent among them a Messenger from themselves [that] Worship Allah not for you (is) any god other than Him Then will not you fear

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِلِقَآءِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَأَتۡرَفۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا مَا هَٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُكُمۡ يَأۡكُلُ مِمَّا تَأۡكُلُونَ مِنۡهُ وَيَشۡرَبُ مِمَّا تَشۡرَبُونَ
ayah_translit: waqala al-mala-u min qawmihi alladhina kafaru wakadhabu biliqai al-akhirati wa-atrafnahum fi al-hayati al-dun'ya ma hadha illa basharun mith'lukum yakulu mimma takuluna min'hu wayashrabu mimma tashrabuna
ayah_english: And said the chiefs of his people who disbelieved and denied (the) meeting (of) the Hereafter while We had given them luxury in the life (of) the world Not (is) this but a man like you He eats of what you eat [from it] and he drinks of what you drink

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِلِقَآءِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَأَتۡرَفۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا مَا هَٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُكُمۡ يَأۡكُلُ مِمَّا تَأۡكُلُونَ مِنۡهُ وَيَشۡرَبُ مِمَّا تَشۡرَبُونَ

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِلِقَآءِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَأَتۡرَفۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا مَا هَٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُكُمۡ يَأۡكُلُ مِمَّا تَأۡكُلُونَ مِنۡهُ وَيَشۡرَبُ مِمَّا تَشۡرَبُونَ

ayah_english: And said the chiefs of his people who disbelieved and denied (the) meeting (of) the Hereafter while We had given them luxury in the life (of) the world Not (is) this but a man like you He eats of what you eat [from it] and he drinks of what you drink

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِلِقَآءِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَأَتۡرَفۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا مَا هَٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُكُمۡ يَأۡكُلُ مِمَّا تَأۡكُلُونَ مِنۡهُ وَيَشۡرَبُ مِمَّا تَشۡرَبُونَ
ayah_translit: waqala al-mala-u min qawmihi alladhina kafaru wakadhabu biliqai al-akhirati wa-atrafnahum fi al-hayati al-dun'ya ma hadha illa basharun mith'lukum yakulu mimma takuluna min'hu wayashrabu mimma tashrabuna

ayah: وَلَئِنۡ أَطَعۡتُم بَشَرٗا مِّثۡلَكُمۡ إِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّخَٰسِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wala-in ata'tum basharan mith'lakum innakum idhan lakhasiruna
ayah_english: And surely if you obey a man like you indeed you then surely (will be) losers

ayah: أَيَعِدُكُمۡ أَنَّكُمۡ إِذَا مِتُّمۡ وَكُنتُمۡ تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَنَّكُم مُّخۡرَجُونَ
ayah_translit: aya'idukum annakum idha mittum wakuntum turaban wa'izaman annakum mukh'rajuna
ayah_english: Does he promise you that you when you are dead and you become dust and bones that you (will be) brought forth

ayah: ۞هَيۡهَاتَ هَيۡهَاتَ لِمَا تُوعَدُونَ
ayah_translit: hayhata hayhata lima tu'aduna
ayah_english: Far-(fetched) far-(fetched) is what you are promised!

ayah: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنۡيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحۡيَا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَبۡعُوثِينَ
ayah_translit: in hiya illa hayatuna al-dun'ya namutu wanahya wama nahnu bimab'uthina
ayah_english: Not it (is) but our life (of) the world we die and we live and not we (will be) resurrected

ayah: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا وَمَا نَحۡنُ لَهُۥ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: in huwa illa rajulun if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban wama nahnu lahu bimu'minina
ayah_english: Not (is) he but a man who (has) invented about Allah a lie and not we (in) him (are) believers

ayah: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا وَمَا نَحۡنُ لَهُۥ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ

ayah: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرۡنِي بِمَا كَذَّبُونِ
ayah_translit: qala rabbi unsur'ni bima kadhabuni
ayah_english: He said My Lord! Help me because they deny me

ayah: قَالَ عَمَّا قَلِيلٖ لَّيُصۡبِحُنَّ نَٰدِمِينَ
ayah_translit: qala amma qalilin layus'bihunna nadimina
ayah_english: He said After a little while After a little while surely they will become regretful

ayah: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ غُثَآءٗۚ فَبُعۡدٗا لِّلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-akhadhathumu al-sayhatu bil-haqi faja'alnahum ghuthaan fabu'dan lil'qawmi al-zalimina
ayah_english: So seized them the awful cry in truth and We made them (as) rubbish of dead leaves So away with the people the wrongdoers

ayah: مَا تَسۡبِقُ مِنۡ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسۡتَـٔۡخِرُونَ
ayah_translit: ma tasbiqu min ummatin ajalaha wama yastakhiruna
ayah_english: Not can precede any nation its term and not they (can) delay (it)

ayah: ثُمَّ أَرۡسَلۡنَا رُسُلَنَا تَتۡرَاۖ كُلَّ مَا جَآءَ أُمَّةٗ رَّسُولُهَا كَذَّبُوهُۖ فَأَتۡبَعۡنَا بَعۡضَهُم بَعۡضٗا وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ أَحَادِيثَۚ فَبُعۡدٗا لِّقَوۡمٖ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: thumma arsalna rusulana tatra kulla ma jaa ummatan rasuluha kadhabuhu fa-atba'na ba'dahum ba'dan waja'alnahum ahaditha fabu'dan liqawmin la yu'minuna
ayah_english: Then We sent Our Messengers (in) succession Every time Every time came (to) a nation its Messenger they denied him so We made (them) follow some of them others and We made them narrations So away with a people not they believe

ayah: ثُمَّ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ وَأَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ

ayah: إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِۦ فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ وَكَانُواْ قَوۡمًا عَالِينَ
ayah_translit: ila fir'awna wamala-ihi fa-is'takbaru wakanu qawman alina

ayah: فَقَالُوٓاْ أَنُؤۡمِنُ لِبَشَرَيۡنِ مِثۡلِنَا وَقَوۡمُهُمَا لَنَا عَٰبِدُونَ
ayah_translit: faqalu anu'minu libasharayni mith'lina waqawmuhuma lana abiduna
ayah_english: Then they said Shall we believe (in) two men like ourselves while their people for us (are) slaves

ayah: فَقَالُوٓاْ أَنُؤۡمِنُ لِبَشَرَيۡنِ مِثۡلِنَا وَقَوۡمُهُمَا لَنَا عَٰبِدُونَ

ayah: فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَكَانُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡمُهۡلَكِينَ

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَدُونَ

ayah: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱبۡنَ مَرۡيَمَ وَأُمَّهُۥٓ ءَايَةٗ وَءَاوَيۡنَٰهُمَآ إِلَىٰ رَبۡوَةٖ ذَاتِ قَرَارٖ وَمَعِينٖ
ayah_translit: waja'alna ib'na maryama wa-ummahu ayatan waawaynahuma ila rabwatin dhati qararin wama'inin
ayah_english: And We made (the) son (of) Maryam and his mother a Sign and We sheltered them to a high ground of tranquility of tranquility and water springs

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلرُّسُلُ كُلُواْ مِنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِ وَٱعۡمَلُواْ صَٰلِحًاۖ إِنِّي بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ عَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-rusulu kulu mina al-tayibati wa-i'malu salihan inni bima ta'maluna alimun
ayah_english: O Messengers O Messengers Eat of the good things and do righteous (deeds) Indeed, I Am of what you do All-Knower

ayah: وَإِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمۡ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمۡ فَٱتَّقُونِ
ayah_translit: wa-inna hadhihi ummatukum ummatan wahidatan wa-ana rabbukum fa-ittaquni
ayah_english: And indeed this your religion (is) religion one And I Am your Lord so fear Me

ayah: وَإِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمۡ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمۡ فَٱتَّقُونِ

ayah: فَتَقَطَّعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَهُم بَيۡنَهُمۡ زُبُرٗاۖ كُلُّ حِزۡبِۭ بِمَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ فَرِحُونَ
ayah_translit: fataqatta'u amrahum baynahum zuburan kullu hiz'bin bima ladayhim farihuna
ayah_english: But they cut off their affair (of unity) between them (into) sects each faction in what they have rejoicing

ayah: فَذَرۡهُمۡ فِي غَمۡرَتِهِمۡ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
ayah_translit: fadharhum fi ghamratihim hatta hinin
ayah_english: So leave them in their confusion until a time

ayah: أَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٖ وَبَنِينَ
ayah_translit: ayahsabuna annama numidduhum bihi min malin wabanina

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ خَشۡيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡتُونَ مَآ ءَاتَواْ وَّقُلُوبُهُمۡ وَجِلَةٌ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ رَٰجِعُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina yu'tuna ma ataw waqulubuhum wajilatun annahum ila rabbihim raji'una
ayah_english: And those who give what they give while their hearts (are) fearful because they to their Lord (will) return

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِ وَهُمۡ لَهَا سَٰبِقُونَ
ayah_translit: ulaika yusari'una fi al-khayrati wahum laha sabiquna

ayah: وَلَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفۡسًا إِلَّا وُسۡعَهَاۚ وَلَدَيۡنَا كِتَٰبٞ يَنطِقُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: wala nukallifu nafsan illa wus'aha waladayna kitabun yantiqu bil-haqi wahum la yuz'lamuna
ayah_english: And not We burden any soul except (to) its capacity and with Us (is) a Record (which) speaks with the truth and they (will) not be wronged

ayah: وَلَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفۡسًا إِلَّا وُسۡعَهَاۚ وَلَدَيۡنَا كِتَٰبٞ يَنطِقُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: wala nukallifu nafsan illa wus'aha waladayna kitabun yantiqu bil-haqi wahum la yuz'lamuna
ayah_english: And not We burden any soul except (to) its capacity and with Us (is) a Record (which) speaks with the truth and they (will) not be wronged

ayah: وَلَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفۡسًا إِلَّا وُسۡعَهَاۚ وَلَدَيۡنَا كِتَٰبٞ يَنطِقُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ

ayah: بَلۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡ فِي غَمۡرَةٖ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا وَلَهُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلٞ مِّن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ هُمۡ لَهَا عَٰمِلُونَ
ayah_translit: bal qulubuhum fi ghamratin min hadha walahum a'malun min duni dhalika hum laha amiluna
ayah_english: Nay their hearts (are) in confusion over this and for them (are) deeds besides besides that they for it (are) doers

ayah: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذۡنَا مُتۡرَفِيهِم بِٱلۡعَذَابِ إِذَا هُمۡ يَجۡـَٔرُونَ
ayah_translit: hatta idha akhadhna mut'rafihim bil-'adhabi idha hum yajaruna
ayah_english: Until when We seize their affluent ones with the punishment behold! They cry for help

ayah: لَا تَجۡـَٔرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ
ayah_translit: la tajaru al-yawma innakum minna la tunsaruna
ayah_english: (Do) not cry for help today Indeed you from Us not will be helped

ayah: قَدۡ كَانَتۡ ءَايَٰتِي تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فَكُنتُمۡ عَلَىٰٓ أَعۡقَٰبِكُمۡ تَنكِصُونَ
ayah_translit: qad kanat ayati tut'la alaykum fakuntum ala a'qabikum tankisuna
ayah_english: Verily were My Verses recited to you but you used (to) on your heels turn back

ayah: مُسۡتَكۡبِرِينَ بِهِۦ سَٰمِرٗا تَهۡجُرُونَ
ayah_translit: mus'takbirina bihi samiran tahjuruna
ayah_english: (Being) arrogant about it conversing by night speaking evil

ayah: أَفَلَمۡ يَدَّبَّرُواْ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ أَمۡ جَآءَهُم مَّا لَمۡ يَأۡتِ ءَابَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_translit: afalam yaddabbaru al-qawla am jaahum ma lam yati abaahumu al-awalina
ayah_english: Then, do not they ponder the Word or has come to them what not (had) come (to) their forefathers (to) their forefathers

ayah: أَمۡ لَمۡ يَعۡرِفُواْ رَسُولَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ
ayah_translit: am lam ya'rifu rasulahum fahum lahu munkiruna
ayah_english: Or (do) not they recognize their Messenger so they (are) rejecting him (are) rejecting him

ayah: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ بِهِۦ جِنَّةُۢۚ بَلۡ جَآءَهُم بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لِلۡحَقِّ كَٰرِهُونَ
ayah_translit: am yaquluna bihi jinnatun bal jaahum bil-haqi wa-aktharuhum lil'haqqi karihuna
ayah_english: Or they say In him (is) madness Nay he brought them the truth but most of them to the truth (are) averse

ayah: وَلَوِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلۡحَقُّ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡ لَفَسَدَتِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَن فِيهِنَّۚ بَلۡ أَتَيۡنَٰهُم بِذِكۡرِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ عَن ذِكۡرِهِم مُّعۡرِضُونَ
ayah_translit: walawi ittaba'a al-haqu ahwaahum lafasadati al-samawatu wal-ardu waman fihinna bal ataynahum bidhik'rihim fahum an dhik'rihim mu'riduna
ayah_english: But if (had) followed the truth their desires surely (would) have been corrupted the heavens and the earth and whoever (is) therein Nay We have brought them their reminder but they from their reminder (are) turning away

ayah: وَلَوِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلۡحَقُّ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡ لَفَسَدَتِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَن فِيهِنَّۚ بَلۡ أَتَيۡنَٰهُم بِذِكۡرِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ عَن ذِكۡرِهِم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

ayah_english: But if (had) followed the truth their desires surely (would) have been corrupted the heavens and the earth and whoever (is) therein Nay We have brought them their reminder but they from their reminder (are) turning away

ayah: وَلَوِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلۡحَقُّ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡ لَفَسَدَتِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَن فِيهِنَّۚ بَلۡ أَتَيۡنَٰهُم بِذِكۡرِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ عَن ذِكۡرِهِم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

ayah: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ خَرۡجٗا فَخَرَاجُ رَبِّكَ خَيۡرٞۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّـٰزِقِينَ
ayah_translit: am tasaluhum kharjan fakharaju rabbika khayrun wahuwa khayru al-raziqina
ayah_english: Or you ask them (for) a payment But the payment (of) your Lord (is) best and He (is) the Best (of) the Providers

ayah: وَإِنَّكَ لَتَدۡعُوهُمۡ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ
ayah_translit: wa-innaka latad'uhum ila siratin mus'taqimin
ayah_english: And indeed you certainly call them to (the) Path Straight

ayah: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَنِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ لَنَٰكِبُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-inna alladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati ani al-sirati lanakibuna
ayah_english: And indeed those who (do) not believe in the Hereafter from the path surely (are) deviating

ayah: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَنِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ لَنَٰكِبُونَ

ayah: ۞وَلَوۡ رَحِمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَكَشَفۡنَا مَا بِهِم مِّن ضُرّٖ لَّلَجُّواْ فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ
ayah_translit: walaw rahim'nahum wakashafna ma bihim min durrin lalajju fi tugh'yanihim ya'mahuna
ayah_english: And if We had mercy on them and We removed what (was) on them of (the) hardship surely they would persist in their transgression wandering blindly

ayah: ۞وَلَوۡ رَحِمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَكَشَفۡنَا مَا بِهِم مِّن ضُرّٖ لَّلَجُّواْ فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَخَذۡنَٰهُم بِٱلۡعَذَابِ فَمَا ٱسۡتَكَانُواْ لِرَبِّهِمۡ وَمَا يَتَضَرَّعُونَ
ayah_translit: walaqad akhadhnahum bil-'adhabi fama is'takanu lirabbihim wama yatadarra'una
ayah_english: And verily We seized them with the punishment but not they submit to their Lord and not they supplicate humbly

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَخَذۡنَٰهُم بِٱلۡعَذَابِ فَمَا ٱسۡتَكَانُواْ لِرَبِّهِمۡ وَمَا يَتَضَرَّعُونَ
ayah_translit: walaqad akhadhnahum bil-'adhabi fama is'takanu lirabbihim wama yatadarra'una
ayah_english: And verily We seized them with the punishment but not they submit to their Lord and not they supplicate humbly

ayah: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فَتَحۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم بَابٗا ذَا عَذَابٖ شَدِيدٍ إِذَا هُمۡ فِيهِ مُبۡلِسُونَ
ayah_translit: hatta idha fatahna alayhim baban dha adhabin shadidin idha hum fihi mub'lisuna
ayah_english: Until when We opened for them a gate of a punishment of a punishment severe behold They in it (will be in) despair

ayah: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةَۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ
ayah_translit: wahuwa alladhi ansha-a lakumu al-sam'a wal-absara wal-afidata qalilan ma tashkuruna
ayah_english: And He (is) the One Who produced for you the hearing and the sight and the feeling little (is) what you give thanks

ayah: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي ذَرَأَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ
ayah_translit: wahuwa alladhi dhara-akum fi al-ardi wa-ilayhi tuh'sharuna
ayah_english: And He (is) the One Who multiplied you in the earth and to Him you will be gathered

ayah: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي ذَرَأَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

ayah_english: And He (is) the One Who multiplied you in the earth and to Him you will be gathered

ayah: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُحۡيِۦ وَيُمِيتُ وَلَهُ ٱخۡتِلَٰفُ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: wahuwa alladhi yuh'yi wayumitu walahu ikh'tilafu al-layli wal-nahari afala ta'qiluna
ayah_english: And He (is) the One Who gives life and causes death and for Him (is the) alternation (of) the night and the day Then will not you reason

ayah: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُحۡيِۦ وَيُمِيتُ وَلَهُ ٱخۡتِلَٰفُ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: wahuwa alladhi yuh'yi wayumitu walahu ikh'tilafu al-layli wal-nahari afala ta'qiluna
ayah_english: And He (is) the One Who gives life and causes death and for Him (is the) alternation (of) the night and the day Then will not you reason

ayah: بَلۡ قَالُواْ مِثۡلَ مَا قَالَ ٱلۡأَوَّلُونَ
ayah_translit: bal qalu mith'la ma qala al-awaluna
ayah_english: Nay they say (the) like (of) what said the former (people)

ayah: قَالُوٓاْ أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبۡعُوثُونَ
ayah_translit: qalu a-idha mit'na wakunna turaban wa'izaman a-inna lamab'uthuna
ayah_english: They said What! When we are dead and become dust and bones would we surely be resurrected

ayah: لَقَدۡ وُعِدۡنَا نَحۡنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا هَٰذَا مِن قَبۡلُ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_translit: laqad wu'id'na nahnu waabauna hadha min qablu in hadha illa asatiru al-awalina
ayah_english: Verily we have been promised [we] and our forefathers this before before not (is) this but (the) tales (of) the former (people)

ayah_english: Say To whom (belongs) the earth and whoever (is) in it if you know

ayah: قُلۡ مَن رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ ٱلسَّبۡعِ وَرَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
ayah_translit: qul man rabbu al-samawati al-sab'i warabbu al-'arshi al-'azimi
ayah_english: Say Who (is the) Lord (of) the seven heavens (of) the seven heavens and (the) Lord (of) the Throne the Great

ayah_translit: sayaquluna lillahi qul afala tattaquna
ayah_english: They will say Allah Say Then will not you fear (Him)

ayah: قُلۡ مَنۢ بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَهُوَ يُجِيرُ وَلَا يُجَارُ عَلَيۡهِ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: qul man biyadihi malakutu kulli shayin wahuwa yujiru wala yujaru alayhi in kuntum ta'lamuna
ayah_english: Say Who is (it) in Whose Hand(s) (is the) dominion (of) all things and He protects and no (one) (can) be protected against Him If you know

ayah: قُلۡ مَنۢ بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَهُوَ يُجِيرُ وَلَا يُجَارُ عَلَيۡهِ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِۚ قُلۡ فَأَنَّىٰ تُسۡحَرُونَ
ayah_translit: sayaquluna lillahi qul fa-anna tus'haruna
ayah_english: They will say Allah Say Then how are you deluded

ayah: بَلۡ أَتَيۡنَٰهُم بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَإِنَّهُمۡ لَكَٰذِبُونَ
ayah_translit: bal ataynahum bil-haqi wa-innahum lakadhibuna
ayah_english: Nay We (have) brought them the truth but indeed they surely (are) liars

ayah: مَا ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ مِن وَلَدٖ وَمَا كَانَ مَعَهُۥ مِنۡ إِلَٰهٍۚ إِذٗا لَّذَهَبَ كُلُّ إِلَٰهِۭ بِمَا خَلَقَ وَلَعَلَا بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
ayah_translit: ma ittakhadha al-lahu min waladin wama kana ma'ahu min ilahin idhan ladhahaba kullu ilahin bima khalaqa wala'ala ba'duhum ala ba'din sub'hana al-lahi amma yasifuna
ayah_english: Not Allah has taken Allah has taken any son and not is with Him any god Then surely (would have) taken away each god what he created and surely would have overpowered some of them [on] others Glory be (to) Allah above what they attribute

ayah_english: Not Allah has taken Allah has taken any son and not is with Him any god Then surely (would have) taken away each god what he created and surely would have overpowered some of them [on] others Glory be (to) Allah above what they attribute

ayah: مَا ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ مِن وَلَدٖ وَمَا كَانَ مَعَهُۥ مِنۡ إِلَٰهٍۚ إِذٗا لَّذَهَبَ كُلُّ إِلَٰهِۭ بِمَا خَلَقَ وَلَعَلَا بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

ayah: عَٰلِمِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ فَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
ayah_translit: alimi al-ghaybi wal-shahadati fata'ala amma yush'rikuna
ayah_english: Knower (of) the unseen and the witnessed exalted is He above what they associate

ayah: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّي مَا يُوعَدُونَ
ayah_translit: qul rabbi imma turiyanni ma yu'aduna
ayah_english: Say My Lord! If You should show me what they are promised

ayah: رَبِّ فَلَا تَجۡعَلۡنِي فِي ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: rabbi fala taj'alni fi al-qawmi al-zalimina
ayah_english: My Lord then (do) not place me among the people the wrongdoers

ayah: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمۡ لَقَٰدِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-inna ala an nuriyaka ma na'iduhum laqadiruna
ayah_english: And indeed We on that We show you what We have promised them surely able

ayah: ٱدۡفَعۡ بِٱلَّتِي هِيَ أَحۡسَنُ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَۚ نَحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَصِفُونَ
ayah_translit: id'fa' bi-allati hiya ahsanu al-sayi-ata nahnu a'lamu bima yasifuna
ayah_english: Repel by that which (is) best the evil We know best of what they attribute

ayah: ٱدۡفَعۡ بِٱلَّتِي هِيَ أَحۡسَنُ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَۚ نَحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَصِفُونَ

ayah: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنۡ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ
ayah_translit: waqul rabbi a'udhu bika min hamazati al-shayatini
ayah_english: And say My Lord! I seek refuge in You from (the) suggestions (of) the evil ones

ayah: وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ رَبِّ أَن يَحۡضُرُونِ
ayah_translit: wa-a'udhu bika rabbi an yahduruni
ayah_english: And I seek refuge in You My Lord! Lest they be present with me

ayah: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ قَالَ رَبِّ ٱرۡجِعُونِ
ayah_translit: hatta idha jaa ahadahumu al-mawtu qala rabbi ir'ji'uni
ayah_english: Until when comes (to) one of them the death he says My Lord! Send me back

ayah: لَعَلِّيٓ أَعۡمَلُ صَٰلِحٗا فِيمَا تَرَكۡتُۚ كَلَّآۚ إِنَّهَا كَلِمَةٌ هُوَ قَآئِلُهَاۖ وَمِن وَرَآئِهِم بَرۡزَخٌ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ
ayah_translit: la'alli a'malu salihan fima taraktu kalla innaha kalimatun huwa qailuha wamin waraihim barzakhun ila yawmi yub'athuna
ayah_english: That I may do righteous (deeds) in what I left behind No Indeed, it (is) a word he speaks it and before them and before them (is) a barrier till (the) Day they are resurrected

ayah: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَلَآ أَنسَابَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ وَلَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-idha nufikha fi al-suri fala ansaba baynahum yawma-idhin wala yatasaaluna
ayah_english: So when is blown in the trumpet then not (there) will be relationship among them that Day and not will they ask each other

ayah: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَلَآ أَنسَابَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ وَلَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

ayah: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَلَآ أَنسَابَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ وَلَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

ayah: فَمَن ثَقُلَتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ
ayah_translit: faman thaqulat mawazinuhu fa-ulaika humu al-muf'lihuna
ayah_english: Then (the one) whose (are) heavy his scales then those they (are) the successful

ayah: وَمَنۡ خَفَّتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ فِي جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدُونَ
ayah_translit: waman khaffat mawazinuhu fa-ulaika alladhina khasiru anfusahum fi jahannama khaliduna
ayah_english: But (the one) whose (are) light his scales then those they [who] have lost their souls in Hell they (will) abide forever

ayah: تَلۡفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا كَٰلِحُونَ
ayah_translit: talfahu wujuhahumu al-naru wahum fiha kalihuna

ayah: قَالُواْ رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتۡ عَلَيۡنَا شِقۡوَتُنَا وَكُنَّا قَوۡمٗا ضَآلِّينَ
ayah_translit: qalu rabbana ghalabat alayna shiq'watuna wakunna qawman dallina
ayah_english: They (will) say Our Lord! Overcame [on] us our wretchedness and we were a people astray

ayah: رَبَّنَآ أَخۡرِجۡنَا مِنۡهَا فَإِنۡ عُدۡنَا فَإِنَّا ظَٰلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: rabbana akhrij'na min'ha fa-in ud'na fa-inna zalimuna
ayah_english: Our Lord! Bring us out from it then if we return then indeed we (would be) wrongdoers

ayah: رَبَّنَآ أَخۡرِجۡنَا مِنۡهَا فَإِنۡ عُدۡنَا فَإِنَّا ظَٰلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: rabbana akhrij'na min'ha fa-in ud'na fa-inna zalimuna

ayah: قَالَ ٱخۡسَـُٔواْ فِيهَا وَلَا تُكَلِّمُونِ
ayah_translit: qala ikh'sau fiha wala tukallimuni
ayah_english: He (will) say Remain despised in it and (do) not speak to Me

ayah: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَرِيقٞ مِّنۡ عِبَادِي يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَا وَٱرۡحَمۡنَا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّـٰحِمِينَ
ayah_translit: innahu kana fariqun min ibadi yaquluna rabbana amanna fa-igh'fir lana wa-ir'hamna wa-anta khayru al-rahimina
ayah_english: Indeed (there) was a party of My slaves (who) said Our Lord! We believe so forgive us and have mercy on us and You (are) best (of) those who show mercy

ayah: فَٱتَّخَذۡتُمُوهُمۡ سِخۡرِيًّا حَتَّىٰٓ أَنسَوۡكُمۡ ذِكۡرِي وَكُنتُم مِّنۡهُمۡ تَضۡحَكُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-ittakhadhtumuhum sikh'riyyan hatta ansawkum dhik'ri wakuntum min'hum tadhakuna
ayah_english: But you took them (in) mockery until they made you forget My remembrance and you used (to) at them laugh

ayah: إِنِّي جَزَيۡتُهُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ بِمَا صَبَرُوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ
ayah_translit: inni jazaytuhumu al-yawma bima sabaru annahum humu al-faizuna
ayah_english: Indeed I have rewarded them this Day because they were patient indeed they [they] (are) the successful ones

ayah: قَٰلَ كَمۡ لَبِثۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ
ayah_translit: qala kam labith'tum fi al-ardi adada sinina
ayah_english: He will say How long did you remain in the earth (in) number (of) years

ayah: قَالُواْ لَبِثۡنَا يَوۡمًا أَوۡ بَعۡضَ يَوۡمٖ فَسۡـَٔلِ ٱلۡعَآدِّينَ
ayah_translit: qalu labith'na yawman aw ba'da yawmin fasali al-'adina
ayah_english: They will say We remained a day or a part (of) a day but ask those who keep count

ayah: قَٰلَ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗاۖ لَّوۡ أَنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: qala in labith'tum illa qalilan law annakum kuntum ta'lamuna
ayah_english: He will say Not you stayed but a little if only you [you] knew

ayah: أَفَحَسِبۡتُمۡ أَنَّمَا خَلَقۡنَٰكُمۡ عَبَثٗا وَأَنَّكُمۡ إِلَيۡنَا لَا تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: afahasib'tum annama khalaqnakum abathan wa-annakum ilayna la tur'ja'una
ayah_english: Then did you think that We created you uselessly and that you to Us not will be returned

ayah: فَتَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ
ayah_translit: fata'ala al-lahu al-maliku al-haqu la ilaha illa huwa rabbu al-'arshi al-karimi
ayah_english: So exalted is Allah the King the Truth (There is) no god except Him (the) Lord (of) the Throne Honorable

ayah: وَمَن يَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ لَا بُرۡهَٰنَ لَهُۥ بِهِۦ فَإِنَّمَا حِسَابُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: waman yad'u ma'a al-lahi ilahan akhara la bur'hana lahu bihi fa-innama hisabuhu inda rabbihi innahu la yuf'lihu al-kafiruna
ayah_english: And whoever invokes with Allah god other no proof for him in it Then only his account (is) with his Lord Indeed [he] not will succeed the disbelievers

ayah: وَمَن يَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ لَا بُرۡهَٰنَ لَهُۥ بِهِۦ فَإِنَّمَا حِسَابُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

ayah: وَمَن يَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ لَا بُرۡهَٰنَ لَهُۥ بِهِۦ فَإِنَّمَا حِسَابُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

ayah_english: And whoever invokes with Allah god other no proof for him in it Then only his account (is) with his Lord Indeed [he] not will succeed the disbelievers

ayah: وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ وَٱرۡحَمۡ وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّـٰحِمِينَ
ayah_translit: waqul rabbi igh'fir wa-ir'ham wa-anta khayru al-rahimina
ayah_english: And say My Lord! Forgive and have mercy and You (are the) Best (of) those who show mercy

ayah: وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ وَٱرۡحَمۡ وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّـٰحِمِينَ
